title: Laundry facilities, Large studio apartments, Free premium cable TV
posting_body: ['MLK Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-No long term lease required', '-Storage Units', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Basketball Court', '-Large two bedroom apartments', '-Free premium cable TV', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Laundry facilities', '-Large loft apartments', '-Large studio apartments', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
